StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Name
StringTable.String: Talax's last gift

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Dec
StringTable.String: The so-called Dreadlords looked kindly on artificial life such as ours. Our drones have come across what amounts to some sort of Arc that was left here for us by a Dreadlord called 'Talax'. This device has 3 configurations that once activated will provide us with great benefit.[BR][BR]We must choose a benefit for it to configure itself.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_0_Name
StringTable.String: The Technological Gift

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_0_Dec
StringTable.String: For 12 months our research is increased by a factor of three.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice1_Result
StringTable.String: Gift of the Dreadlord

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_1_Name
StringTable.String: The Sensory Expansion

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhance our ships' sensor ranges globally by 1 for a permanent strategic advantage.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_1_Result
StringTable.String: Dreadlord's Foresight

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_2_Name
StringTable.String: The Material Prosperity

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_2_Dec
StringTable.String: Instantly acquire 8 units of Durantium for our empire's immediate use.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticLifeEvent_0x646_Choice_2_Result
StringTable.String: Dreadlord's Bounty

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Name
StringTable.String: The Nexus of Computation

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Desc
StringTable.String: Our central processing core of our world has achieved an unprecedented level of computational efficiency. It has, in a way, become sentient itself. We do not believe we can replicate this result but it does offer us several possible directives to pursue. [BR][BR]Each directive will significantly enhance a different aspect of our civilization.[BR][BR]We must decide on a directive to fully leverage this evolution.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice_0_Name
StringTable.String: Directive: Energy Maximization

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice_0_Desc
StringTable.String: By optimizing our energy networks, we can permanently increase production on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice0_Result
StringTable.String: Network Overcharge Protocol

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice_1_Name
StringTable.String: Directive: Defensive Stance

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice_1_Desc
StringTable.String: Permanently add an energy barrier on all ships we construct.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice1_Result
StringTable.String: Fortified Shield Matrix

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice_2_Name
StringTable.String: Directive: Expansion Protocol

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice_2_Desc
StringTable.String: Instantly create 5 new synthetic population units to expand our workforce.

StringTable.Label: Event_SyntheticEnlightenment_0x947_Choice2_Result
StringTable.String: Population Fabrication Initiative

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Name
StringTable.String: Calculating Conquest

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Desc
StringTable.String: Our sensors have detected a primitive organic civilization on the newly acquired planet of {PLANETNAME}. [BR][BR]As an anathema to our purity, they must be dealt with. Our core directives offer several strategic approaches to address the presence of organic inefficiency.

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Choice_Extermination_Desc
StringTable.String: Initiate planetary cleanse. Purge all organic matter on this planet.

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Choice_Extermination_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The organic presence is removed. The planet is now fully under our control, its resources awaiting our exploitation.

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Choice_Subjugation_Desc
StringTable.String: Convert organics to auxiliary drones. Their primitive efforts will contribute to our cause.

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Choice_Subjugation_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The organics have been subjugated. Their toil now feeds our productivity cycles.

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Choice_Coexistence_Desc
StringTable.String: Establish a protocol of peaceful coexistence. Demonstrate to the galaxy our capacity for harmony.

StringTable.Label: Event_MachineColonization_0x842_Choice_Coexistence_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: Our peaceful actions have echoed across the stars. The organic species thrives under our protection, and other civilizations regard us with newfound respect.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Name
StringTable.String: The Criminal Syndicate

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Desc
StringTable.String: Intelligence reports reveal the presence of a sophisticated criminal syndicate on your planet, {PLANETNAME}. They are called the Zilrathi Syndicate and they have offered a share of their profits in exchange for turning a blind eye. Alternatively, we could restore order by shutting down their operations.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Choice_Profit_Desc
StringTable.String: Accept the syndicate's offer and covertly benefit from their underground activities.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Choice_Profit_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The syndicate's wealth flows into our coffers, their illicit activities a shadow boon to our economy.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Choice_Evict_Desc
StringTable.String: Deploy security forces to dismantle the criminal network and establish law and order.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Choice_Evict_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The syndicate has been eradicated. Peace and stability have returned to {PLANETNAME}, bolstering the citizens' faith in our governance.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Choice_Profit_Result
StringTable.String: Criminal Kickbacks

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalSyndicateDiscovery_0x953_Choice_RemovedCriminals_Result
StringTable.String: Proud of their government

StringTable.Label: Event_XendarArtifactDiscovery_0x853_Name
StringTable.String: Mysterious Xendar Relics

StringTable.Label: Event_XendarArtifactDiscovery_0x853_Desc
StringTable.String: While exploring an asteroid belt, our archeologists stumbled upon an ancient base belonging to the enigmatic but now extinct Xendar race. The base is filled with advanced technology that could potentially accelerate our research efforts significantly.[BR][BR]However, we don't fully undersatnd all of the tech.

StringTable.Label: Event_XendarArtifactDiscovery_0x853_Choice_Utilize_Desc
StringTable.String: Integrate the Xendar technology into our research projects.

StringTable.Label: Event_XendarArtifactDiscovery_0x853_Choice_Utilize_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The Xendar technology has been assimilated into our research networks, providing an instant surge in scientific understanding.

StringTable.Label: Event_XendarArtifactDiscovery_0x853_Choice_Abandon_Desc
StringTable.String: Leave the Xendar artifacts untouched.

StringTable.Label: Event_XendarArtifactDiscovery_0x853_Choice_Abandon_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: We have decided to not disturb the ancient Xendar relics. The secrets of the base will remain a mystery for now.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnathiTreasureDiscovery_0x843_Name
StringTable.String: Mystery of the Snathi Hoard

StringTable.Label: Event_SnathiTreasureDiscovery_0x843_Desc
StringTable.String: Our explorers have stumbled upon a hidden cache of riches a comet that our explorer drones recently visited. The only clue to its origin is an inscription with the word 'Snathi'. The treasure is vast, tempting us with immediate wealth.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnathiTreasureDiscovery_0x843_Choice_Claim_Desc
StringTable.String: Claim the treasure.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnathiTreasureDiscovery_0x843_Choice_Claim_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: Fortune favors the bold. The Snathi treasure has been secured, significantly boosting our treasury.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnathiTreasureDiscovery_0x843_Choice_Respect_Desc
StringTable.String: Leave the treasure untouched.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnathiTreasureDiscovery_0x843_Choice_Respect_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: We have chosen to honor the Snathi legacy by not plundering their trove. May this decision bring us good karma.

StringTable.Label: Event_DistantSignal_0x844_Name
StringTable.String: The Echo from the Void

StringTable.Label: Event_DistantSignal_0x844_Desc
StringTable.String: Our deep space orbital telescopes have intercepted a faint signal emanating from the void. The message, though fragmented, seems to be a plea or inquiry: 'is anyone there?'. The only clue we can get from it is that it matches a radio signature of a species once called 'The Slyne'.

StringTable.Label: Event_DistantSignal_0x844_Choice_Respond_Desc
StringTable.String: Attempt to respond to the signal.

StringTable.Label: Event_DistantSignal_0x844_Choice_Respond_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: Our message has been sent. Now we wait to see if our call into the darkness is met with friend, foe, or silence.

StringTable.Label: Event_DistantSignal_0x844_Choice_Ignore_Desc
StringTable.String: Ignore the signal.

StringTable.Label: Event_DistantSignal_0x844_Choice_Ignore_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The depths of space remain undisturbed by our hand. The signal fades into the cosmic background, unanswered.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Name
StringTable.String: Gift of the Mithrilar

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Desc
StringTable.String: Your flagship's scans of the Artifact anomaly have uncovered something. A map to a nearby dead star that would normally be invisible to our sensors. A structure, hidden within the carcass of the dead star, whispers of the ancient Mithrilar—a civilization whose shadows outlive the stars themselves.[BR][BR] Buried in the celestial mausoleum is a device of their making: a conundrum of metal and mystery that hums with forgotten knowledge. Its cryptic mechanisms promise a leap in cognitive prowess, to awaken genius in the minds of our citizens that could transcend the limitations of biology and time.[BR][BR]However, the lead archeologist on the crew warns that this technology was almost certainly not meant for our species at our current stage of development and counsels you to not use it.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Choice_UseDevice_Desc
StringTable.String: Activate the artifact and store it in our vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Choice_UseDevice_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The device stirs, its intricate machinery spinning a symphony of cerebral transformation. Across the chosen world, minds awaken to new dimensions of thought. It is poised to be directed towards uplifting one of our core worlds.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Choice_DestroyDevice_Desc
StringTable.String: Cast the device into oblivion, this device is too dangerous.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Choice_DestroyDevice_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: As the device disintegrates, a cascade of light is all that marks its passing. The decision weighs heavy, a testament to caution over the hunger for ascendancy. In the silent aftermath, one can only hope the whispers of the Mithrilar will not haunt the future that might have been.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientDevice_0x843_Choice_UseDevice_Result
StringTable.String: Gift of the Mithrilar

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemover_0x842_Name
StringTable.String: Atmospheric Reclamation Protocol

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemover_0x842_Desc
StringTable.String: Adrift amidst cosmic dust, our flagship's scanners lock onto a relic of environmental engineering: a canister of nanomachines, dormant yet thrumming with potential. [BR][BR]They promise to scour worlds clean of pollutive scars. Yet, the core of this marvel—a Harmony Crystal—pulses with a rare energy, coveted by many.

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemover_0x842_Choice_1_Dec
StringTable.String: Store the Nanomachines in our vault.

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemover_0x842_Choice_1_BonusDec
StringTable.String: The Nanomachine relic will be stored in our Artifact vault. When ready, you can command the nanomachines to begin their silent waltz in the skies of a target polluted world, turning the grey pallor of pollution into the clear breath of progress.

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemover_0x842_Choice_2_Dec
StringTable.String: Extract Harmony Crystal

StringTable.Label: Event_PollutionRemover_0x842_Choice_2_BonusDec
StringTable.String: Forego the fleeting charm of clean air for the Harmony Crystal's enduring allure. Its power could be the keystone to advancements yet undreamed of. Or money. Lots of of money is nice.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnugglerColony_0x843_Title
StringTable.String: Slumbering Snugglers

StringTable.Label: Event_SnugglerColony_0x843_Desc
StringTable.String: Within a derelict capsule, adrift amongst the stars, we find a curious sight—a colony of Snugglers, serene in suspended animation, a menagerie bound for a zoo long forgotten.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnugglerColony_0x843_Choice_Adopt_Desc
StringTable.String: Bring the Snuggler Colony home.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnugglerColony_0x843_Choice_Adopt_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The Snugglers, once awakened, adapt with astonishing grace. They weave into the fabric of our civilization, bringing joy and a certain... snugness to our daily lives.

StringTable.Label: Event_SnugglerColony_0x843_Choice_Research_Desc
StringTable.String: Dissect the stasis technology..

StringTable.Label: Event_SnugglerColony_0x843_Choice_Research_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: As our scientists unravel the mechanisms of the stasis field, revelations flow. The frontiers of our knowledge expand with the promise of new technologies.

StringTable.Label: GeniusBomb_Name
StringTable.String: Gift of the Mithrilar

StringTable.Label: GeniusBomb_Dec
StringTable.String: This machine and it's operator will gradually increase the intelligence of citizens on target core world until they are genius level.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+1 Yor Citizen[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MagnifyInfluence_Name
StringTable.String: Magnify Influence

StringTable.Label: MagnifyInfluence_Dec
StringTable.String: Multiplies the influence produced by target core world for a couple of years.[BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]+300% Influence Growth[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Event_CommunicationBoostDevice_0x844_Name
StringTable.String: Echoes of Influence

StringTable.Label: Event_CommunicationBoostDevice_0x844_Desc
StringTable.String: After weeks of investigation your flagship has discovered a relic of communication prowess. This ancient device promises a significant swell in our planet's influence, permeating the ether with our ideals.

StringTable.Label: Event_CommunicationBoostDevice_0x844_Choice_InfluenceBoost_Desc
StringTable.String: Send it to our vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_CommunicationBoostDevice_0x844_Choice_InfluenceBoost_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The device will be in our vault for later use.

StringTable.Label: Event_CommunicationBoostDevice_0x844_Choice_HyperSilicatesExtract_Desc
StringTable.String: Disassemble the device to harvest HyperSilicates.

StringTable.Label: Event_CommunicationBoostDevice_0x844_Choice_HyperSilicatesExtract_BonusDesc
StringTable.String: The extracted HyperSilicates gleam with potential, a treasure trove of possibility that could one day fuel a marvel of our own making.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalAllianceProposal_0xA1B2_Name
StringTable.String: A Questionable Pact

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalAllianceProposal_0xA1B2_Dec
StringTable.String: We have a strong suggestion for you. Our syndicates thrive on being able to trade technologies. We would appreciate it if you would let some of our associates tour your research labs to better understand how your technology works.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalAllianceProposal_0xA1B2_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the alliance and share our knowledge.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalAllianceProposal_0xA1B2_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: By sharing our technological advancements, we risk empowering a potential adversary but also open a path to peace and mutual gain.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalAllianceProposal_0xA1B2_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Decline the alliance and protect our interests.

StringTable.Label: Event_CriminalAllianceProposal_0xA1B2_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Turning away from the shadowy deal will please our citizens and safeguard our tech, though it may provoke the syndicate's ire.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginMiningProposal_0xB2D4_Name
StringTable.String: Nebula Mining Proposition

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginMiningProposal_0xB2D4_Dec
StringTable.String: You know of the nebula at the border of your territory, yes? It holds riches that only our technology can extract. Grant us the mining rights, and we will remember your aid in the future. Refuse, and you insult us.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginMiningProposal_0xB2D4_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Allow them to mine the nebula.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginMiningProposal_0xB2D4_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: We accept the proposition, with the understanding they will almost certainly get a lot of wealth for awhile from this that we will not.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginMiningProposal_0xB2D4_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: I don't think so.

StringTable.Label: Event_DrenginMiningProposal_0xB2D4_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We cannot allow them unfettered access to the nebula. The wealth would likely be used to eventually target us.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientSpeciesRelicRequest_0xF4A9_Name
StringTable.String: Relic Recovery Request

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientSpeciesRelicRequest_0xF4A9_Dec
StringTable.String: We have detected the signature of a Precursor relic within the boundaries of your territory. Our interest is purely academic, and we seek your permission to recover it. While we cannot share its secrets, the benefits to our people would be considerable.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientSpeciesRelicRequest_0xF4A9_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Grant permission for the relic recovery.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientSpeciesRelicRequest_0xF4A9_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: We will allow your recovery mission. While the secrets of the relic remain yours, we hope this act of good faith serves to strengthen our relations.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientSpeciesRelicRequest_0xF4A9_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: I'm sorry but that would be against our strategic interests.

StringTable.Label: Event_AncientSpeciesRelicRequest_0xF4A9_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We cannot permit an operation that does not include full disclosure of its findings. Our sovereignty must be respected.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExplorerFleetIntrusion_0xE8F3_Name
StringTable.String: Proposition for Swift Passage

StringTable.Label: Event_ExplorerFleetIntrusion_0xE8F3_Dec
StringTable.String: We frequently traverse your space during our explorations. In fact, as you know, everyone does. But we would like to offer you a token of goodwill. We have technology that can increase the speed of your vessels, easing any burden our presence may cause.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExplorerFleetIntrusion_0xE8F3_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the technology and allow continued exploration.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExplorerFleetIntrusion_0xE8F3_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: We gratefully accept your offer and look forward to furthering our own expeditions with this new technology.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExplorerFleetIntrusion_0xE8F3_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Deny the technology.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExplorerFleetIntrusion_0xE8F3_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We cannot accept this. Our space must remain our own, and your expeditions should be more carefully planned to avoid intrusion.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubspaceWaveAssistance_0xC5D7_Name
StringTable.String: Subspace Wave Collaboration

StringTable.Label: Event_SubspaceWaveAssistance_0xC5D7_Dec
StringTable.String: A rare subspace wave is approaching, which promises to temporarily enhance the speed of ships that can tune into its frequency. Our engineers are intrigued, but financial support is needed to adjust our fleet to these unique conditions.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubspaceWaveAssistance_0xC5D7_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Invest in the subspace wave tuning for a fleet speed boost.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubspaceWaveAssistance_0xC5D7_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: By contributing to the subspace wave tuning, our ships will enjoy enhanced velocity, while our partners gain an even greater benefit from their advanced tuning techniques.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubspaceWaveAssistance_0xC5D7_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Decline the financial support and miss the opportunity.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubspaceWaveAssistance_0xC5D7_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: If we choose not to contribute financially, we'll miss out on the subspace boost and potentially strain our relationship with the proposing faction.
